name: Name
name_length: A name must be at least 4 characters long
description1: This website,  created by students of the TFO Max Valier (Hannes Stecher, Johannes Hörmann, Lion Kirchler, Christian Mick, and Benjamin Demetz),  helps calculate the CO2 footprint of schools
description2: It collects data on mobility, devices, paper usage,and food consumption. The gathered information is used to calculate the school's carbon footprint using a dedicated app. For more information
main_page_starting_hint: No Emission Item created, click on the '+' Button below to start

hints.toner_emission_module: Please insert the amount of toner cartridges used a year
hints.water_emission_module: Please insert the amount of water used a year
hints.school_car_emission_module: Please insert the amount of driven kilometers a year for all the school vehicles
hints.dina4_emission_module: Please insert the amount of printed DIN A4 pages a year
hints.dina3_emission_module: Please insert the amount of printed DIN A3 pages a year
hints.pizza_emission_module: Please insert the amount in kg of pizzas sold a year
hints.drinks_500ml_emission_module: Please insert the amount of drinks of 500ml sold a year
hints.coffee_emission_module: Please insert the amount of cups of coffee sold a year
hints.server_emission_module: Please insert the amount of server in use
hints.printer_3d_emission_module: Please insert the amount of 3D Printer in use
hints.printer_emission_module: Please insert the amount of Printer in use
hints.plotter_emission_module: Please insert the amount of Plotter in use
hints.laptop_emission_module: Please insert the amount of Laptop in use
hints.computer_emission_module: Please insert the amount of Computer in use

electricity_emission_module.hint: No Electricity Item created, click on the '+' Button below to start
electricity_emission_module.WIND_ELECTRICITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of wind energy used a year
electricity_emission_module.HYDRO_POWER_ELECTRICITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of hydro power used a year
electricity_emission_module.NATURAL_GAS_ELECTRICITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of natural gas used a year
electricity_emission_module.OIL_ELECTRICITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of oil used a year
electricity_emission_module.COAL_ELECTRICITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of coal used a year

hints.heating_emission_module: Please insert the amount of gas used a year for heating

mobility_emission_module.hint: No Mobility Item created, click on the '+' Button below to start
mobility_emission_module.PKW_MOBILITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of driven kilometers a year for all the cars
mobility_emission_module.BUS_MOBILITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of driven kilometers a year for all the buses
mobility_emission_module.TRAIN_MOBILITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of driven kilometers a year for all the trains
mobility_emission_module.CITY_BUS_MOBILITY_TYPE: Please insert the amount of driven kilometers a year for all the city buses
